data.title: Publications – Redwing Research Group
data.text:
Publications

Publications over the past 9 years are listed below. For a complete and up-to-date listing please check Google Scholar

2021

“Gas source chemical vapor deposition of hexagonal boron nitride on C-plane sapphire using B2H6 and NH3,” A. Bansal, X. Zhang and J.M. Redwing, J. Mater. Res. in press.
